price: 70. Tik tai man buvo apreikšta, kad aš esu akivaizdus perspėtojas.“
arabic: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: in yūḥā ilayya illā annamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
